title: OP圈地插件
author: ssa194
txt_content: 求个OP圈地的插件，可以只让OP和腐竹有管理权限，普通玩家破环不了

replies.author: Nerey
replies.txt_content: 领地插件就行啊。。。。resadmin create 领地名{:10_492:}

replies.author: qq1341581495
replies.txt_content:
